price: Samaki akammeza hali ya kuwa ni mwenye kulaumiwa.
footnotes: Samaki akammeza, naye hakika alistahiki lawama kwa kuikimbia kazi yake ya Daa'wa, Wito, kuwaitia watu wafuate Haki, na kuacha kuwasubiria wale walio kwenda kinyume naye..

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
